Water.CalmWater: Symbolizes the unconscious mind, inner peace
Water.Ice: Symbolizes frozen emotions, defense mechanisms, suspended state

Fire.Volcano: Represents repressed emotions erupting, uncontrollable power

Air/Wind.Breeze: Represents flow of thoughts, subtle changes

Earth/Ground.GroundCollapsing: Signifies loss of support, shaken beliefs

Reptiles.Crocodile: Symbolizes primal fear, potential danger, aggression

CharacterTypes.FamiliarPeople: Symbolizes aspects of personality, relationship projections
CharacterTypes.Children: Symbolizes innocent self, vulnerability, new possibilities
CharacterTypes.ElderlyPeople: Represents wisdom, passage of time, inner guidance
CharacterTypes.Twins/Doppelgangers: Symbolizes different aspects of self, duality
CharacterTypes.Enemies/Opponents: Represents shadow aspects, unaccepted parts of self
CharacterTypes.Mentors/Teachers: Symbolizes inner wisdom, guidance for growth

SituationsAndActivities.Falling: Represents loss of control, status decline, letting go
SituationsAndActivities.Flying: Symbolizes transcending limitations, freedom, perspective shift
SituationsAndActivities.HidingOrSeeking: Represents avoidance and exploration, inner quest
SituationsAndActivities.CrossingDoors/Passages: Symbolizes transition, new phase, consciousness shift
SituationsAndActivities.Climbing: Represents effort, overcoming difficulties, growth process

Smartphone.LostPhone: Symbolizes lost connection, identity crisis, social anxiety
Smartphone.CannotConnect: Represents isolation, inability to express, broken relationships

Computer/Internet.Virus/Hacking: Represents boundary invasion, privacy concerns, vulnerability
Computer/Internet.DataLoss: Represents memory concerns, loss of important content

SocialMedia.HackedAccount: Represents identity crisis, loss of control
SocialMedia.VirtualPersona: Symbolizes separation between authentic and presented self
SocialMedia.InformationOverload: Represents stress, decision fatigue, scattered attention

VirtualReality.ImmersiveExperience: Symbolizes escape from reality, substitute satisfaction
VirtualReality.CannotExit: Symbolizes being stuck in patterns, repetitive behavior
VirtualReality.TechnicalFailure: Represents sense of reality collapse, challenged belief systems

Ego.DreamManifestation: Protagonist, center of consciousness, current identity
Ego.Function: Connects conscious and unconscious, integrates experiences

Shadow.DreamManifestation: Same-sex enemies, dangerous figures, disturbing images
Shadow.Function: Presents repressed qualities, unaccepted parts of self

Anima/Animus.SymbolicObjects: Ideal female (for males) or male (for females) figures
Anima/Animus.Function: Connects conscious and unconscious, promotes psychic integration

WiseOldMan/GreatMother.Function: Provides guidance, symbolizes inner wisdom and nourishment

Self.Function: Represents psychic integration goal, complete self

Fear/Anxiety.CommonSymbols: Darkness, mazes, pursuers, deep water, snakes
Fear/Anxiety.TypicalDreams: Unable to escape, falling, being lost, unprepared
Fear/Anxiety.ModernManifestations: Forgotten passwords, network disconnection, lost phone, missed important information
Fear/Anxiety.PotentialMeaning: Unprocessed trauma, lack of security, fear of the unknown

Anger/Frustration.CommonSymbols: Fire, destruction scenes, red color, combat, obstacles
Anger/Frustration.TypicalDreams: Conflict, being prevented, unable to achieve goals
Anger/Frustration.ModernManifestations: Technical failures, system crashes, network attacks, virtual arguments
Anger/Frustration.PotentialMeaning: Violated boundaries, blocked self-expression, power imbalance

Sadness/Loss.CommonSymbols: Rain, gray color, empty houses, fog, withered trees
Sadness/Loss.TypicalDreams: Losing, searching, unable to reunite, saying goodbye
Sadness/Loss.ModernManifestations: Deleted information, broken connections, lost data, expired accounts
Sadness/Loss.PotentialMeaning: Unfinished grieving, difficulty adapting to change, low self-worth

Joy/Satisfaction.CommonSymbols: Sunshine, gardens, ascending, bright colors, flying
Joy/Satisfaction.ModernManifestations: Perfect connections, technological breakthroughs, virtual achievements, social recognition

Confusion/Uncertainty.CommonSymbols: Fog, crossroads, mazes, morphing objects, multiple doors
Confusion/Uncertainty.TypicalDreams: Difficulty choosing, identity ambiguity, changing environments
Confusion/Uncertainty.ModernManifestations: Algorithm recommendation chaos, information overload, multiple identities, virtual/reality confusion
Confusion/Uncertainty.PotentialMeaning: Unclear life direction, value conflicts, role transition period

LucidDreams.Characteristics: Awareness of dreaming, possible dream control
LucidDreams.InterpretationFeatures: Combination of symbolism and direct experience

RecurringDreams.Characteristics: Same or similar themes appearing repeatedly
RecurringDreams.PsychologicalSignificance: Unresolved issues, emphasis on important information
RecurringDreams.InterpretationFeatures: Focus on persistent themes and subtle changes
